scripts.scss: node-sass --source-map-embed src/scss/main.scss dist/main.css && npm run postcss
scripts.watch: npm run watch:html & npm run watch:css
scripts.start: npm run dist && npm run watch & live-server dist
scripts.build:css: npm run scss && csso dist/main.css dist/main.css
scripts.dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && cp -r src/. dist && rm -rf dist/scss
scripts.build: npm run dist && npm run build:css
